titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the historic definition of a recession is 2 negative quarters of gross domestic product growth.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the historic definition of a recession is 2 negative quarters of gross domestic product growth.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution states that two consecutive quarters of negative growth in gross domestic product constitutes a recession.
